sentences.en: Back in Britain, things appear, on the surface, simpler.
sentences.cn: 而在英国国内，事情表面上看来要简单一些。

sentences.en: By all accounts, Rodger would appear to be a fine fellow.
sentences.cn: 据说，罗杰是个好小伙。

sentences.en: Dwight Eisenhower possessed much the same ability to appear likeable.
sentences.cn: 德怀特·艾森豪威尔也具备上述做出讨人喜欢的样子的能力。

sentences.en: He continued to appear in the office with unfailing regularity thereafter.
sentences.cn: 从那以后他照常出现在办公室，风雨无阻。

sentences.en: He tried hard to appear calm .
sentences.cn: 他努力让自己显得镇静。

sentences.en: He tried to make it appear that she had committed suicide.
sentences.cn: 他试图制造她自杀的假象。

sentences.en: He was bailed to appear before local magistrates on 5 November.
sentences.cn: 他获得保释，将于11月5日在地方法庭出庭受审。

sentences.en: I don’t want to appear rude.
sentences.cn: 我不想显得无礼。

sentences.en: It may be less useful than it appears at first.
sentences.cn: 这可能没有一开始显得那么有用。

sentences.en: Most doctors appear to recognize homeopathy as a legitimate form of medicine.
sentences.cn: 大多数医生似乎都接受顺势疗法是一种合理的医疗手段。

sentences.en: New diet books appear at a rate of nearly one a week.
sentences.cn: 新的饮食类书籍差不多一周出一本。

sentences.en: Nine months later, those talks appear as distant as ever.
sentences.cn: 9个月以后，那些会谈似乎仍然遥遥无期。

sentences.en: Police have found what appear to be human remains.
sentences.cn: 警方发现了疑似人体遗骸的东西。

sentences.en: She did her best to appear more self-assured than she felt.
sentences.cn: 她竭力让自己表现得比实际更自信。

sentences.en: Supergroup U2 will appear at Wembley Stadium on April 20.
sentences.cn: 4月20日，超人气乐团 U2将现身温布利体育场。

sentences.en: Symptoms may not appear for some weeks, so diagnosis can be difficult.
sentences.cn: 症状可能在几周里都不会出现，所以诊断起来会比较困难。

sentences.en: The car seemed to appear from nowhere.
sentences.cn: 这辆车好像是突然间从哪里冒出来的。

sentences.en: The large, purplish blue flowers appear in early June.
sentences.cn: 略微发紫的大朵蓝花在6月初绽放。

sentences.en: The picture will now appear, as if by magic!
sentences.cn: 这幅画立刻就会出现，好像变魔术一般！

sentences.en: The presidency is beginning to appear a political irrelevance.
sentences.cn: 总统一职似乎正在沦为政治上的摆设。

sentences.en: The right colours can make a small room appear much bigger.
sentences.cn: 颜色运用恰当可以使小房间显得大很多。

sentences.en: Two faces appeared at our window.
sentences.cn: 两张面孔出现在我们的窗口。

sentences.en: Would you turn down $7,000,000 to appear nude in a magazine?
sentences.cn: 给你700万美元要你裸体登上杂志，你会拒绝吗？

trans.tran_cn: 看来，好像，出现，出演，起源，首次使用，出版，广播，演出，抵达，出庭
trans.tran_en: used to say how something seems, especially from what you know about it or from what you can see

trans.tran_cn: 出现； 看来， 似乎
trans.tran_en: used to say how something seems, especially from what you know about it or from what you can see

trans.tran_cn: 出现， 露出； 似乎， 好像； 发表， 问世
trans.tran_en: used to say how something seems, especially from what you know about it or from what you can see
